name: Perform R&D
terse: Combine multiple pieces of gear or weapons
detail:
3 segment progress clock

0-9 add 1 bars to the progress counter
10-19 add 2 bars to the progress counter
20+ add 3 bars to the progress counter

the total number of bars required for the counter depend on the complexity of what you're trying to make, available resources, and so on, and as such is up to the DM
